topic.title: [SOLVED] zeronet-py3 doesn't work in TOR:Always mode
topic.body:
ZeroNet version: last
Operating system: ubuntu 19.04 x64
Web browser: Firefox 67.0.4
Tor status: Always
Port: Closed

there is only one onion tracker in trackers list - zero://boot3rdez4rzn36x.onion and it is constantly in state Error (0% success), so no one zite can update

TOR is running and zeronet v.2 in this environment works great

1562911609_1ByEFvdTMnxu7oCEKWA46ZuGVBjPX.body:
Connections
0 of 1087 peers
Onion: 535 peers (0 connections)
Incoming: NaN%
Ping avg: 0ms (min: nullms)

When TOR:Available

Connections
13 of 1252 peers
Onion: 649 peers (1 connections)
Incoming: 8%
Ping avg: 983ms (min: 0ms)

Oh, it was my mistake, sorry!
I made special user for zeronet daemon, but requirements were installed from me (I guess that "sudo python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt" doesn't install them system-wide)
So, I run this string from zeronet user and it's works now!

> [anshorei](#comment_33_1CgdRv2BFaVqNfmK3qGVYDuA7EDmk8dJVS): @symoned, you can share your cert between computers easily with ZN, if you want.

I know it, thanks
